text: Two women who fell from a speeding private bus were killed on the spot near Alangudi on Wednesday. The incident happened when the driver of the bus going from Pudukottai to Alangudi, was negotiating a turn at Araiyapatti near Alangudi resulting in three women, one of them with her one-year-old-infant, losing their balance and falling out through the exit. C. Kamalam (52) and M. Mahadevi (54) succumbed to the injuries while Umamageswari (22) and her son Jagan were admitted to the Government Headquarters Hospital. The police have arrested Karunakaran, the bus driver, and are investigating.
title: Two women killed in freak accident
